text: The Big Heat is a 1953 American crime movie directed by Fritz Lang and was based on the novel of the same name by William P. McGivern. It stars Glenn Ford, Gloria Grahame, Jocelyn Brando, Alexander Scourby, Lee Marvin, Jeanette Nolan, Peter Whitney and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1953 crime movies Category:1953 thriller movies Category:1950s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about suicide
title: The Big Heat
